briefTitle: AeroVanc in the Treatment of Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus Aureus Infection in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of AeroVanc for the Treatment of Persistent Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus Aureus Lung Infection in Cystic Fibrosis Patients
summary: This is a multi-center, randomized phase III study to evaluate the clinical effectiveness of AeroVanc in persistent methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) infection in patients with cystic fibrosis (CF).

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) Percent Predicted

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
